page.title: 15FARNBOROUGH VILLAGE
page.content: In Farnborough Village Hall,there are many clubs,including a Bridge club,a Women's Institute,Whist Drives,Girl Guides,Nursery school and Keep Fit.There is also a Barclays Bank and a Dental Surgery .There are some shops cosisting of a "Spar",which is a type of supermarket.A cafe and a farm shop called Viner's Farm.Farnborough Sports Club is in the High Street as well.There is a children's play area with three baby swings,three swings for older children ,a see-saw and some benches for the adults . The houses in the High Street are a mixture of terraced and semi-detached .There are not many of these .There is one pub called "The Change of Horses". There are several minor roads and closes leading off the High Street. Beside the play park ,there is a playing field.
